thread.title: Gregory Mark Joins Zycus as Its North American Chief Customer Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Gregory Mark Joins Zycus as Its North American Chief Customer Officer
text:
PRINCETON, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Zycus, a leading global provider of comprehensive, end-to-end Source-to-Pay solution suites for procurement, is pleased to announce and welcome Gregory Mark (Greg) as its North American Chief Customer Officer.
Greg joins Zycus with over 15 years of experience in the procurement space. During the course of his professional career, he has witnessed the evolution of procurement from being a siloed support unit to becoming a critical, strategic function within corporations worldwide. Prior to joining Zycus, Greg was the CEO of Hubwoo S.A. – a cloud-based spend management and business process automation solution provider - where he managed a team of over 200 professionals spread across Europe, Asia and the Americas. Prior to Hubwoo, Greg held executive level positions at both Perfect Commerce and Commerce One where at the latter, he held the role of Vice President of Marketplace Operations and Strategy.
At Zycus, Greg will build and manage teams both in India and in the US with a strong focus on customer delivery and success.
“Zycus’ vision and execution capabilities are unique in the market and this is clearly evident looking at the companies they have on-boarded as customers. I am very excited to join the team at Zycus and be a part of this chapter in its growth story” said Greg, Chief Customer Officer, Zycus Inc.
“Greg has an outstanding track record of building and managing high performance teams. His leadership, vision, and domain knowledge are exemplary. I look forward to Greg contributing to the continued growth of Zycus as an S2P leader” said Aatish Dedhia, CEO, Zycus Inc.
About Zycus Inc.
Zycus is a leading global provider of an end-to-end Source-to-Pay suite. Zycus’ comprehensive product portfolio includes applications for both the operational and strategic aspects of procurement.
To learn more about Zycus, visit www.zycus.com
